comment:
* Class to validate compatibility between {@link
 * android.health.connect.datatypes.ExerciseSessionRecord} type and child {@link
 * android.health.connect.datatypes.ExerciseSegment} types.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static void validateSessionAndSegmentsTypes(int sessionType, List<ExerciseSegment> segments)
methods.comment:
* Validates that session type is compatible with segments types. Skips checks if the session or
     * segment type is not known with the current module version.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static void validateExerciseRouteTimestamps(Instant sessionStartTime, Instant sessionEndTime, ExerciseRoute route)
methods.comment:
* Validates that all {@link ExerciseRoute} locations timestamps are within session start and
     * end time interval.
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: public static void validateSessionAndSegmentsTypes(int sessionType, List<ExerciseSegment> segments)
